summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 50th Avenue South, from Genesee Street to Lake Washington Boulevard; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9029 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
